segments.text: There's a contrast between the vibrant garden outside and the turmoil within.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I see the woman drying her dishes, completely unaware of the chaos she has created.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her foot is already in that puddle, yet she doesn't react at all.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The kids are creeping closer to trouble, and my heart races with anxiety.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is almost tipping over, his balance hanging by a thread as he reaches.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I want to scream and tell them to be careful, but I know it's too late.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The whole scene makes me feel helpless, caught between wanting to intervene and just watching.
segments.speaker: PAR
